<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Need to update the pre-loop basic block to branch to the correct place.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// branch to the main loop if the count is non-zero, branch to the residual</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// loop if the copy size is smaller then 1 iteration of the main loop but</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// non-zero and finally branch to after the residual loop if the memcpy</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  size is zero.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantint">ConstantInt</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/logicalview/#a9696bc411b0a7022c2cc78bff5173cefad7ed4ee1df437474d005188535f74875">Zero</a> = ConstantInt::get(ILengthType, 0U);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Determine if we need to branch to the residual loop or bypass it.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In this case the loop operand type was a byte, and there is no need for a</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// residual loop to copy the remaining memory after the main loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We do however need to patch up the control flow by creating the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// terminators for the preloop block and the memcpy loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/constantint">ConstantInt</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/logicalview/#a9696bc411b0a7022c2cc78bff5173cefad7ed4ee1df437474d005188535f74875">Zero</a> = ConstantInt::get(ILengthType, 0U);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlight">    PLBuilder.CreateCondBr(PLBuilder.CreateICmpNE(RuntimeLoopBytes, Zero),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">                           LoopBB, PostLoopBB);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If \\p Addr1 and \\p Addr2 are pointers to different address spaces, create an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// addresspacecast to obtain a pair of pointers in the same addressspace. The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// caller needs to ensure that addrspacecasting is possible.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// No-op if the pointers are in the same address space.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> std::pair&lt;Value &#42;, Value &#42;&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357" lineLink="#a19caca7bafe1b8a5f67802ce62431282"><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="#a19caca7bafe1b8a5f67802ce62431282">tryInsertCastToCommonAddrSpace</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase">IRBuilderBase</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Addr1, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;Addr2,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><span class="doxyHighlight">                               </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo">TargetTransformInfo</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;ResAddr1 = Addr1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;ResAddr2 = Addr2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AS1 = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;PointerType&gt;</a>(Addr1-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>())-&gt;getAddressSpace();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AS2 = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;PointerType&gt;</a>(Addr2-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>())-&gt;getAddressSpace();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (AS1 != AS2) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ResAddr2 = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.CreateAddrSpaceCast(Addr2, Addr1-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>.isValidAddrSpaceCast(AS1, AS2))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ResAddr1 = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.CreateAddrSpaceCast(Addr1, Addr2-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Can only lower memmove between address spaces if they &quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><span class="doxyHighlight">                       </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;support addrspacecast&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;ResAddr1, ResAddr2&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Lower memmove to IR. memmove is required to correctly copy overlapping memory</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// regions; therefore, it has to check the relative positions of the source and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// destination pointers and choose the copy direction accordingly.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The code below is an IR rendition of this C function:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// void&#42; memmove(void&#42; dst, const void&#42; src, size&#95;t n) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   unsigned char&#42; d = dst;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   const unsigned char&#42; s = src;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   if (s &lt; d) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     // copy backwards</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     while (n--) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       d&#91;n&#93; = s&#91;n&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#125; else &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     // copy forward</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     for (size&#95;t i = 0; i &lt; n; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       d&#91;i&#93; = s&#91;i&#93;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   return dst;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the TargetTransformInfo specifies a wider MemcpyLoopLoweringType, it is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// used for the memory accesses in the loops. Then, additional loops with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// byte-wise accesses are added for the remaining bytes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402" lineLink="#af1d16783f6f4b4d20427e93da6dd606f"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">static</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="#af1d16783f6f4b4d20427e93da6dd606f">createMemMoveLoopUnknownSize</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;InsertBefore,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                         <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;SrcAddr, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;DstAddr,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                         <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;CopyLen, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> SrcAlign,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                         <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> DstAlign, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SrcIsVolatile,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                         </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DstIsVolatile,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                         </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targettransforminfo">TargetTransformInfo</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the memory accesses are wider than one byte, residual loops with</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00435" /><CodeLine lineNumber="435"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00436" /><CodeLine lineNumber="436"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> PLBuilder(InsertBefore);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00437" /><CodeLine lineNumber="437"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00438" /><CodeLine lineNumber="438"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;RuntimeLoopBytes = CopyLen;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00439" /><CodeLine lineNumber="439"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;RuntimeLoopRemainder = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00440" /><CodeLine lineNumber="440"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;SkipResidualCondition = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00441" /><CodeLine lineNumber="441"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RequiresResidual) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00442" /><CodeLine lineNumber="442"><span class="doxyHighlight">    RuntimeLoopRemainder = <a href="#a44515fcaecd86d209a06157dc45983fa">getRuntimeLoopRemainder</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>, PLBuilder, CopyLen,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                           LoopOpSize, RuntimeLoopRemainder);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;SkipMainCondition =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><span class="doxyHighlight">      PLBuilder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a8c75539a39f167f352b37ccdd788a7e4">CreateICmpEQ</a>(RuntimeLoopBytes, Zero, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;skip&#95;main&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Create the a comparison of src and dst, based on which we jump to either</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the forward-copy part of the function (if src &gt;= dst) or the backwards-copy</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// part (if src &lt; dst).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// SplitBlockAndInsertIfThenElse conveniently creates the basic if-then-else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// structure. Its block terminators (unconditional branches) are replaced by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the appropriate conditional branches when the loop is built.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the pointers are in different address spaces, they need to be converted</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to a compatible one. Cases where memory ranges in the different address</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// spaces cannot overlap are lowered as memcpy and not handled here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#91;CmpSrcAddr, CmpDstAddr&#93; =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="#a19caca7bafe1b8a5f67802ce62431282">tryInsertCastToCommonAddrSpace</a>(PLBuilder, SrcAddr, DstAddr, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa0d69e81725c10fa5407f0bf34462068">TTI</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;PtrCompare =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><span class="doxyHighlight">      PLBuilder.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase/#a09b4daefdf5b73efba51ce7ae6cd45c5">CreateICmpULT</a>(CmpSrcAddr, CmpDstAddr, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;compare&#95;src&#95;dst&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;ThenTerm, &#42;ElseTerm;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7ac00229d8c59902686f52ed061cdc80">SplitBlockAndInsertIfThenElse</a>(PtrCompare, InsertBefore-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-node-impl/#af719fc783be6589465137d997701a432">getIterator</a>(),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                &amp;ThenTerm, &amp;ElseTerm);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the LoopOpSize is greater than 1, each part of the function consists of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// four blocks:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   memmove&#95;copy&#95;backwards:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       skip the residual loop when 0 iterations are required</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   memmove&#95;bwd&#95;residual&#95;loop:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       copy the last few bytes individually so that the remaining length is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//       a multiple of the LoopOpSize</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   memmove&#95;bwd&#95;middle: skip the main loop when 0 iterations are required</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   memmove&#95;bwd&#95;main&#95;loop: the actual backwards loop BB with wide accesses</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   memmove&#95;copy&#95;forward: skip the main loop when 0 iterations are required</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   memmove&#95;fwd&#95;main&#95;loop: the actual forward loop BB with wide accesses</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   memmove&#95;fwd&#95;middle: skip the residual loop when 0 iterations are required</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   memmove&#95;fwd&#95;residual&#95;loop: copy the last few bytes individually</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The main and residual loop are switched between copying forward and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// backward so that the residual loop always operates on the end of the moved</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// range. This is based on the assumption that buffers whose start is aligned</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with the LoopOpSize are more common than buffers whose end is.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the LoopOpSize is 1, each part of the function consists of two blocks:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   memmove&#95;copy&#95;backwards: skip the loop when 0 iterations are required</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   memmove&#95;bwd&#95;main&#95;loop: the actual backwards loop BB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   memmove&#95;copy&#95;forward: skip the loop when 0 iterations are required</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   memmove&#95;fwd&#95;main&#95;loop: the actual forward loop BB</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;CopyBackwardsBB = ThenTerm-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-detail/node-parent-access/#a7e19e7508415378ad9523e0339b23e22">getParent</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><span class="doxyHighlight">  CopyBackwardsBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a35ee267850af7c235474a8c46c7ac5af">setName</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;memmove&#95;copy&#95;backwards&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;CopyForwardBB = ElseTerm-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-detail/node-parent-access/#a7e19e7508415378ad9523e0339b23e22">getParent</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><span class="doxyHighlight">  CopyForwardBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a35ee267850af7c235474a8c46c7ac5af">setName</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;memmove&#95;copy&#95;forward&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;ExitBB = InsertBefore-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ilist-detail/node-parent-access/#a7e19e7508415378ad9523e0339b23e22">getParent</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498"><span class="doxyHighlight">  ExitBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a35ee267850af7c235474a8c46c7ac5af">setName</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;memmove&#95;done&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00499" /><CodeLine lineNumber="499"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00500" /><CodeLine lineNumber="500"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> PartSrcAlign(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#acd6aa057934751aaac54e5c18bcc18eb">commonAlignment</a>(SrcAlign, LoopOpSize));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00501" /><CodeLine lineNumber="501"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> PartDstAlign(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#acd6aa057934751aaac54e5c18bcc18eb">commonAlignment</a>(DstAlign, LoopOpSize));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00502" /><CodeLine lineNumber="502"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00503" /><CodeLine lineNumber="503"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Accesses in the residual loops do not share the same alignment as those in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00504" /><CodeLine lineNumber="504"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the main loops.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00507" /><CodeLine lineNumber="507"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Copying backwards.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42;MainLoopBB = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a4a5b798214be930cf8e133c032ba0129">BasicBlock::Create</a>(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we used LoopOpType as GEP element type, we would iterate over the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// buffers in TypeStoreSize strides while copying TypeAllocSize bytes,</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="706"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Helper function to generate a load/store pair of a given type in the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="707"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// residual. Used in the forward and backward branches.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="708"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> GenerateResidualLdStPair = &#91;&amp;&#93;(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;OpTy, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilderbase">IRBuilderBase</a> &amp;Builder,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="709"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                      uint64&#95;t &amp;BytesCopied) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="710"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/align">Align</a> ResSrcAlign(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#acd6aa057934751aaac54e5c18bcc18eb">commonAlignment</a>(SrcAlign, BytesCopied));</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="712"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OperandSize = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#ad467c4ab9119043f9b7750ab986be61a">DL</a>.getTypeStoreSize(OpTy);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="715"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we used LoopOpType as GEP element type, we would iterate over the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="716"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// buffers in TypeStoreSize strides while copying TypeAllocSize bytes, i.e.,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="717"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// we would miss bytes if TypeStoreSize != TypeAllocSize. Therefore, use</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="718"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// byte offsets computed from the TypeStoreSize.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="719"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;SrcGEP = Builder.CreateInBoundsGEP(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Builder.CreateAlignedLoad(OpTy, SrcGEP, ResSrcAlign, SrcIsVolatile);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="723"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;DstGEP = Builder.CreateInBoundsGEP(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="725"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Builder.CreateAlignedStore(Load, DstGEP, ResDstAlign, DstIsVolatile);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="726"><span class="doxyHighlight">    BytesCopied += OperandSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="727"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="728"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="733"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Residual code is required to move the remaining bytes. We need the same</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="735"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instructions as in the forward case, only in reverse. So we generate code</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="736"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the same way, except that we change the IRBuilder insert point for each</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="737"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// load/store pair so that each one is inserted before the previous one</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="738"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instead of after it.</span></CodeLine>
